featured.text: I remember that on my cruise I was required to formally plot our course, using the tide table, even though our goal was an island I could see quite clearly across the water in the distance. 44.

definition.zh_def: 正式地，按照規定或慣例地。
definition.en_def: In a formal manner; according to established rules or conventions.
definition.example: The invitation was formally addressed to all the guests.
